lead_paragraph: The Education Department was sending letters home with students that include an address for a website where parents can track the results of lead testing in schools.

headline.print_headline: City Moves to Reassure Parents  About Water Quality in Schools
headline.main: Lead Problems Elsewhere Prompt New York Schools to Show Drinking Water Is Safe

snippet: The Education Department was sending letters home with students that include an address for a website where parents can track the results of lead testing in schools.
abstract: New York City has created website for parents to track results of lead testing in schools, in response to revelation of high lead levels in water in Newark schools.
